snippet: Mr. Trump, in emphasizing gun issues and the Supreme Court during a speech, issued what some saw as a threat to Mrs. Clinton....
abstract: Donald J Trump makes comments that seem to suggest gun owners might take matters into their own hands if Hillary Clinton is elected president and appoints Supreme Court justices who favor stronger gun control measures; Democrats quickly condemn comments and accuse Trump of calling for violence against Clinton or liberal judges.

byline.original: By NICK CORASANITI and MAGGIE HABERMAN
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Patrick Healy, Alexander Burns, Thomas Kaplan, Matt Flegenheimer and Ashley Parker.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump, in emphasizing gun issues and the Supreme Court during a speech, issued what some saw as a threat to Mrs. Clinton.

headline.main: Donald Trump Suggests ‘Second Amendment People’ Could Act Against Hillary Clinton
headline.print_headline: Trump Suggests Gun Owners Act Against Clinton
